p: Cytotoxic activity of the P. dioscoridis and E. bonariensis EOs and a mixture of them (1:1, w/ w), separately were carried out against the three human cancer cells, breast adenocarcinoma cells (MCF-7), lung cancer cells (A-549), and hepatocellular carcinoma cells (HepG2), using sulforhodamine B (SRB) protocol.
